CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains to MOT about the experiment and the videotaping then leaves room
MOT is carrying CHI and moves to put her down so they can both sit on the floor
MOT walks over to toys on the floor
MOT points to the toys on the floor
CHI walks over and picks up the football and holds it up to her mouth
CHI sits on the floor still holding the ball
CHI looks at MOT and lets the ball go
MOT is mostly out of camera view
CHI pushes toy car along the floor
CHI turns to the jack+in+the+box puts one hand on it and looks up at MOT
MOT sits back against the wall
CHI touches the jack+in+the+box and it pops
CHI tries unsuccessfully to push the jack+in+the+box back in several times
CHI looks up at MOT once briefly and then looks towards the book
CHI turns to book and reaches out for the book
CHI flips pages of the book
CHI flips through the pages again
CHI has paused at a picture of Cookie Monster in the book
CHI touches the picture on the page
CHI looks over at the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI reaches over and grabs the jack+in+the+box again
CHI tries to push the jack+in+the+box back in
MOT reaches over to pick up a duck toy and squeezes it so it makes a squeaky noise
CHI turns to face MOT and the noise of the duck
MOT places the duck on the floor in front of CHI
CHI grabs duck and examines it
CHI holds the duck up to MOT and drops it
MOT picks up the duck and squeezes it
MOT makes motions to CHI lips with the duck
CHI tries to grab the duck twice
MOT gives the duck to CHI
MOT points to the chair in the corner of the room
CHI squeezes the duck and looks down at it
CHI puts toy in her mouth
CHI with back to MOT reaches over for the book and puts duck on the floor . <aft> CHI flips through the book and then turns to the jack+in+the+box and attempts to push it down again
CHI picks up the duck again
<aft> CHI turns to MOT and looks at duck then squeezes it so it makes a squeaking sound
CHI continues to squeeze the toy duck
CHI turns and tosses duck onto the book on the floor
CHI picks up duck and suddenly turns to show MOT
CHI looks down at the duck and then up at MOT
CHI moves toward MOT holding the duck up in the air
CHI puts the duck on MOT's lap and makes the duck do a jump off of MOT's lap to the floor
CHI puts duck back on MOT lap and repeats jumping action
CHI puts the duck back on MOT lap to repeat action
CHI puts the duck back up on MOT lap
CHI makes duck jump again then sits up and looks in the garbage can to her right
CHI continues to look into the garbage can
MOT shakes her head indicating no and makes a sour face
CHI sits back down and looks at MOT
MOT look at the chair across the room
CHI turns to look at the chair and looks around the room
MOT leans forward and points to the chair across the room
the bear is imprinted on the upholstery of the chair
<$=2> MOT leans down and looks in CHI's face
CHI turns around and looks at the garbage can again
CHI continues to look into garbage can
CHI sits down and looks at the toy duck which she is still holding
CHI squeezes the duck once briefly
CHI moves to put the duck on MOT's lap to play jumping game
CHI moves duck in jumping motion off of MOT's lap
CHI looks down at the duck
MOT leans over and looks into CHI face
MOT continues to look at CHI closely
CHI offers the duck up to MOT for a kiss from MOT
CHI looks up towards the desk
CHI holds the duck up to MOT
there is a lot of background noise
CHI gets up on her knees and looks in the garbage can again then sits down and examines the duck
MOT takes duck and squeezes it so it makes a squeaky sound
CHI watches MOT squeeze the duck
MOT crawls to the chair and puts the duck on it
CHI watches MOT as she moves and smiles at duck and then turns and smiles at MOT
CHI crawls over to the duck on the chair
CHI reaches up clumsily for the duck
CHI grabs the duck and stands up
CHI turns to MOT and shows her the duck
CHI holds duck up to MOT
INV begins to open the door
CHI holds duck in mouth and watches INV open the door and come into the room

INV enters the room at 14:59:40 and explains Small Scale Activity to MOT and leaves room while it takes place . INV re-enters at 15:06:26 . INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at table
INV lets CHI hold the beads but puts all the other toys away
<bef> INV reaches into drawer and pulls out forbidden object . INV puts the object on the table and sets it into motion
CHI looks at the object as it is placed on the table and begins to smile
CHI puts the necklace down on the table
MOT reaches to hold CHI hands away from the object
CHI struggles lightly with MOT who is restraining her from touching the object and continues to smile
CHI struggles with MOT through this entire sequence of utterances
CHI stretches her hand back as she looks at teh object
<bef> sharp intake of breath . <aft> MOT begins to laugh
CHI tries to reach for the object as she stares at it and smiles
CHI reaches her hand out towards the object

g.ga: watching CHI struggle to touch object

u.a: INV takes the forbidden object and puts it away in drawer
CHI watches object as it is put away
MOT leans close to CHI and looks into her face
INV explains the four parent child interaction boxes to MOT then leaves room . MOT takes CHI out of the chair and she walks over to garbage can .
<aft> INV leaves the room with toys from Small Scale Activity
CHI takes a few steps closer to MOT
CHI is standing facing the door and glancing at MOT
MOT reaches into a box and pulls out a ball
MOT holds ball out for CHI to see and moves to sit down in front of CHI
CHI gestures towards the ball with her open palm
MOT sits down on the floor and places ball down
CHI squats down to pick up the ball and tosses it
MOT tosses the ball back to CHI
CHI watches the ball roll to her feet then reaches down and picks it up . CHI holds the ball up and looks at MOT for approximately three seconds
CHI tosses the ball back to MOT
CHI moves forward to catch the ball . <aft> CHI misses the ball and picks it up then stands up to throw to MOT but instead drops the ball over her shoulder
<aft> CHI turns to see where ball landed
CHI lifts up arm and ball falls off to the side
CHI bends down to pick up the ball and squeezes it
CHI starts to move ball towards MOT
CHI moves the ball toward MOT and squeezing it
CHI sits back and lets go of ball
MOT looks up and nods toward other activity boxes on the desk
CHI crawls over to the table
MOT gets up off the floor
<$=1> MOT goes over to the desk
CHI looks up at MOT who is standing at the desk getting another activity
<aft> MOT walks over to CHI with the towel for peekaboo
CHI sits up and watches MOT
MOT moves to sit in front of CHI and puts peekaboo towel over her head
CHI leans forward slightly and looks at MOT
MOT puts peekaboo towel in CHI's arms
CHI puts the towel down and turns away from the game
CHI points to the bears on the chair
MOT refers to the teddy bear upholstery on the chair
MOT puts the towel over her head
MOT still has her face covered by the towel
CHI stands up by the chair
MOT still holds the towel over her head
CHI does not look at MOT but looks at the chair
MOT gets up and moves toward the desk
CHI glances at MOT and then looks at the chair
MOT gets up and goes over to the desk
MOT is out of camera view
CHI walks over to where MOT is standing by the desk
<$=1> MOT moves toward the table with a box of paper and crayons
MOT puts the paper on the table
CHI watches MOT put the activity on the table
MOT moves the sassy seat from under the table
CHI looks at the sassy seat
MOT offers the crayons to CHI
a lot of background noise is present
CHI looks at the crayons as MOT puts them down on the table
CHI moves toward the table and the crayons
MOT pulls the chair over so CHI can sit in it
CHI turns to see the chair that MOT is moving
<3-4> MOT lifts CHI into the chair
MOT slides CHI's chair up to the table
CHI looks at the crayons in her hand
<$=1> MOT searches through the sheets for a clean piece of paper
MOT pulls out a paper for CHI to write on
CHI looks at the paper and the crayons on the table
<$=1> MOT walks over to the desk
MOT seems to be looking at CHI but her top half is not in camera view
CHI sits at the table with the crayons in her hand and looks at paper
MOT sits on floor next to CHI
CHI watches MOT sit on the floor
MOT picks up the crayon and begins to draw
CHI begins to write with her crayon also
<bef> MOT points twice at the picture she drew on the paper and looks at CHI
CHI stops moving the crayon and watches MOT point at her drawing
CHI begins to draw again pushing her crayon hard into the paper
CHI stops drawing and looks at her crayon
CHI holds crayon up for MOT to see
CHI looks closely at the crayon again
CHI still looks at the crayon
CHI looks at the crayon then puts it down on the table and picks up another crayon
CHI pushes the pile of paper around on the table so that there is only one piece in front of her
a telephone is heard in background
CHI repeatedly taps the crayon on the paper
CHI pulls the papers back in front of her and then hits the crayon on them
<aft> CHI turns around and checks out what is in back of her and extends one of her legs
MOT looks over in the direction in which CHI looks
CHI turns back around then drops the crayon on the table only to quickly pick it up again and place it down
CHI reaches over to pick up a doughnut-shaped piece of paper that is on the table
CHI is holding the piece of doughnut-shaped paper in her hand . CHI reaches over and picks up the crayons again as she continues to hum
CHI holds the crayons up on the paper
<aft> CHI turns to MOT and holds crayons out to her
MOT moves to take the crayons
CHI has turned back toward the paper and holds the crayons
MOT moves to grab a crayon from CHI
CHI pulls the crayons back away from MOT
CHI points at the paper but does not write
MOT reaches up for the box on the desk and puts it on the table
CHI puts the crayons in the box
<$=1> MOT begins to pick up the papers and put them into the box
CHI tries to hold some of the paper that MOT is putting in the box but she cannot grasp it
MOT removes her hands from the box
CHI reaches into the box to get the crayons but cant pick them up
MOT reaches over to the desk for a cover to the box
CHI looks over at MOT and the cover she is holding
MOT holds the cover right over the box
CHI holds the crayons up in the air
CHI drops one of the crayons into the box
CHI holds the other crayon out to MOT
MOT holds the cover up and is otherwise out of camera view
MOT begins to close the box on CHI's arm
CHI grabs the cover and pulls it off to the side
MOT pulls the cover off from the side and holds it
CHI looks down at the crayon in her hand
CHI looks at the cover that MOT is holding and then back at the table
MOT mostly out of camera view
CHI looks at the box and puts the crayon in it
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT reaches over to the box and puts the cover on
MOT moves the box onto the desk
CHI looks at MOT getting a new activity at the desk
MOT takes the book out of the box and walks over to the table with it
MOT moves to put the book in front of the CHI on the table
CHI takes the book and opens it up to the middle pages
MOT sits down next to CHI and reaches over to the book
CHI takes the book and closes it
CHI looks at MOT then begins to open the book again
MOT reaches over to book again
MOT points at a picture in the book
<$=1> MOT points to a picture in the book and looks at CHI
CHI moves to get up out of the chair
MOT reaches back to the desk toward the box of crayons and paper
MOT closes the book and the box that it belongs in and puts it away
MOT brings the crayon and paper box down to the table
CHI readjusts herself in the chair
MOT reopens the crayons and paper box
MOT reaches into the box and takes out the paper and crayons
MOT finishes putting the crayons on the table and puts the box and cover off to the side
MOT puts the box back on the desk
CHI picks up the crayons and looks at them
MOT turns and reaches for something on the desk
MOT gets up from the floor and stands behind CHI chair
CHI puts the crayons up to her mouth
